# GCControllerTouchpad.TouchState.moving

**Case**

The user continues touching the surface.

## Declaration

```swift
case moving
```

## States

- **GCControllerTouchpad.TouchState.up**: The user stops or isn’t touching the surface.
- **GCControllerTouchpad.TouchState.down**: The user starts touching the surface.

items.description: The user stops or isn’t touching the surface.

items.description: The user starts touching the surface.
